titles.title: Military Family Assistance Act of 2006
A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to carry out a program on the provision of assistance to certain military families.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 5/3/2006--Introduced. Military Family Assistance Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of Defense to carry out a program awarding grants to non-federal entities to provide assistance to families of members of the Armed Forces who live more than 180 miles from a military installation where members on active duty are stationed.
